original: 妙法蓮華經馬明菩薩品第三十
analyzed: 妙法蓮華經馬明菩薩品第三十
translated: The Lotus Sutra, Chapter 30: The Bodhisattva Maiming

original: 佛言。地深二十億萬里。地下有潤澤。深二十
analyzed: 佛言。地深二十億萬里。地下有潤澤。深二十
translated: The Buddha said: The earth is 200 million miles deep. Below the earth, there is moisture, 20

original: 億萬里。澤下有金粟。深二十億萬里。金粟
analyzed: 億萬里。澤下有金粟。深二十億萬里。金粟
translated: billion miles deep. Below the moisture, there is golden grain, 20 billion miles deep. Below the
golden grain, there is diamond.
20 billion miles deep.
Below the diamond, there is great water.
80 billion miles deep.
Below the water, there is an infinite great wind.
520 billion miles deep.
The diamond holds the heaven and earth together and prevents them from falling.
When the heaven and earth are about to be destroyed, seven suns appear.
When two suns appear, they stop and do not move.
All the springs and streams dry up.

original: 三日出時諸河水悉皆枯盡。
analyzed: 三日出時諸河水悉皆枯盡。
translated: When three suns appear, all the river water dries up.

original: 四日出時大河及江皆為枯盡。
analyzed: 四日出時大河及江皆為枯盡。
translated: When four suns appear, the great rivers and streams all dry up.
When five suns appear, the great ocean dries up.

original: 六日出時天下欝欝如陶家。
analyzed: 六日出時天下欝欝如陶家。
translated: When six suns appear, the world becomes as hot as a potter's kiln.
Just as when a fire is lit, there is black smoke.

original: 七日出時天下都火然燒盡。
analyzed: 七日出時天下都火然燒盡。
translated: When the sun appears for seven days, the whole world will be burned to the ground,

original: 須彌山及天下萬物一切皆盡。
analyzed: 須彌山及天下萬物一切皆盡。
translated: Mount Sumeru and all the myriad things in the world will be completely destroyed.

original: 其火盛熱上燒諸天六天皆盡。
analyzed: 其火盛熱上燒諸天六天皆盡。
translated: The raging heat of the fire will burn up the heavens above, destroying the six heavens.

original: 其火盛熱徹至第十五光音天上。
analyzed: 其火盛熱徹至第十五光音天上。
translated: The raging heat of the fire will penetrate up to the fifteenth heaven of the luminous sounds.

original: 世間人民善多者死上生第十五天上。
analyzed: 世間人民善多者死上生第十五天上。
translated: The people of the world who have much goodness will die and be reborn in the fifteenth heaven above.

original: 其善少者死生他方國土。
analyzed: 其善少者死生他方國土。
translated: Those with little goodness will die and be reborn in the lands of other directions.

original: 此間地獄中罪人皆生他方地獄中受罪。
analyzed: 此間地獄中罪人皆生他方地獄中受罪。
translated: The sinners in the hells of this world will all be reborn in the hells of other directions to receive their punishments.
After the burning of heaven and earth, there will be a great wind.

original: 從他方來持雲上至第七天。
analyzed: 從他方來持雲上至第七天。
translated: Coming from other directions, it will hold up the clouds up to the seventh heaven.
It will rain, with drops
as large as chariot wheels.
In this way, it will rain for millions and millions of years.
The water will rise up to the fifteenth heaven of the Brahmas.

original: 其雨乃上上四面皆有大風斷使不溢。
analyzed: 其雨乃上上四面皆有大風斷使不溢。
translated: The rain will be cut off by the great winds from the four directions so that it does not overflow.

original: 風起撓動其水億千萬歲。
analyzed: 風起撓動其水億千萬歲。
translated: The wind will stir up the water for millions and millions of years.
The water then gradually decreases.
Next, there is a wind that arises,
called the Pure Adornment.
It stirs up the water,
and thick foam arises on the waves, transforming into the seven treasures.

original: 始作第六他化自在天宮。
analyzed: 始作第六他化自在天宮。
translated: It first creates the sixth heaven of the Heaven of Free Enjoyment of Manifestations by Others.
The water gradually decreases.

original: 淨莊嚴風起吹水沫化為七寶。
analyzed: 淨莊嚴風起吹水沫化為七寶。
translated: The Pure Adornment wind arises and blows the water foam, transforming it into the seven treasures.
Next, it creates the fifth heaven of the Heaven of Delight in Creating.
It gradually decreases.

original: 淨莊嚴風起吹水沫化為七寶。
analyzed: 淨莊嚴風起吹水沫化為七寶。
translated: The Pure Adornment wind arises and blows the water foam, transforming it into the seven treasures.
Next, it creates the fourth heaven of the Heaven of Yāma.
The water gradually decreases.

original: 淨莊嚴風起吹水沫化為七寶。
analyzed: 淨莊嚴風起吹水沫化為七寶。
translated: The Pure Adornment wind arises and blows the water foam, transforming it into the seven treasures.
Next, it creates the third heaven of the Heaven of the Thirty-three.
The water gradually decreases.

original: 淨莊嚴風起吹水沫化為七寶。
analyzed: 淨莊嚴風起吹水沫化為七寶。
translated: The Pure Adornment wind arises and blows the water foam, transforming it into the seven treasures.
Gold, silver, crystal, and lapis lazuli.
In the middle of the heavens, it creates Mount Sumeru.
It is 3,360,000 li high.
The water gradually decreases.

original: 淨莊嚴風起吹水沫化為七寶。
analyzed: 淨莊嚴風起吹水沫化為七寶。
translated: A pure and majestic wind arose, blowing the water droplets and transforming them into the seven treasures.

original: 須彌山頂作第二忉利天宮。
analyzed: 須彌山頂作第二忉利天宮。
translated: On the peak of Mount Sumeru, the second palace of the Heaven of the Thirty-three was created.
The water gradually decreased.

original: 淨莊嚴風起吹水沫化為七寶。
analyzed: 淨莊嚴風起吹水沫化為七寶。
translated: A pure and majestic wind arose, blowing the water droplets and transforming them into the seven treasures.

original: 當須彌山半腰於四聳上作四天王宮。
analyzed: 當須彌山半腰於四聳上作四天王宮。
translated: Halfway up Mount Sumeru, the palaces of the Four Heavenly Kings were created.
The water gradually decreased.

original: 淨莊嚴風起吹水沫化為七寶。🔽黃金水精作日。
analyzed: 淨莊嚴風起吹水沫化為七寶。 黃金水精作日。
translated: A pure and majestic wind arose, blowing the water droplets and transforming them into the seven treasures.🔽Gold and crystal were used to create the sun.
Silver and lapis lazuli were used to create the moon.
And the stars and the palaces of the honored gods were created.
The water gradually decreased.

original: 堅固風起吹水沫化為寶。
analyzed: 堅固風起吹水沫化為寶。
translated: A firm wind arose, blowing the water droplets and transforming them into treasures.

analyzed: 作十寶山。 一者金山。
translated: Ten jeweled mountains were created.🔽The first is the Golden Mountain.

analyzed: 二者銀山。 三者琉璃山。
translated: The second is the Silver Mountain.🔽The third is the Lapis Lazuli Mountain.
The fourth is the Agate Mountain.

analyzed: 五者車𤦲山。 六者琥珀山。
translated: The fifth is the Jasper Mountain.🔽The sixth is the Amber Mountain.
The seventh is the Crystal Mountain.
The eighth is the Water Crystal Mountain.
The ninth is the White Jade Mountain.
Tenth, purple gold mountains.

original: 及作二十八部地天宮殿。
analyzed: 及作二十八部地天宮殿。
translated: And create the palaces of the twenty-eight divisions of the earth gods.
The seven main treasures.
The remaining miscellaneous treasures are of one hundred and twenty kinds.

original: 安住風起吹水沫化作鐵圍山。
analyzed: 安住風起吹水沫化作鐵圍山。
translated: The wind of stability arises and blows the water foam to form the Iron Ring Mountain.

original: 大鐵圍山周圍三千大千世界。
analyzed: 大鐵圍山周圍三千大千世界。
translated: The Great Iron Ring Mountain surrounds the trichiliocosm.

original: 次不動風起吹清水為海。
analyzed: 次不動風起吹清水為海。
translated: Next, the immovable wind arises and blows the clear water to form the ocean.
The extremely turbid foam transforms into stone mountains.
The turbid water is used to form the four continents and land.

original: 及作八萬小城陸地天地。
analyzed: 及作八萬小城陸地天地。
translated: And create the eighty thousand small cities and land of the earth gods.
After the land and cities are formed, earth fungus naturally grows on the ground.

original: 後第十五天上人漸漸來下。
analyzed: 後第十五天上人漸漸來下。
translated: Later, the people of the fifteenth heaven gradually come down.
They reside in the six desire heavens.
Later, they come down to the earth.
They either eat earth fungus.
After eating earth fungus, they become greedy for its taste.
Their bodies become heavy and they can no longer fly.
Those whose blessings are exhausted become worldly people.
They no longer have light.
The lifespan of humans is immeasurable years.
The earth fungus is exhausted.
Later, the earth-flavor appeared.
People took it to eat together.
Their lifespans were millions and billions of years.
When the earth-flavor was exhausted,
later, earth-fat appeared.
People took the yellow substance to eat it.
After millions of years,
when the earth-fat was exhausted,
naturally-grown nonglutinous rice appeared.
People ate the nonglutinous rice together.
After eating the nonglutinous rice,

original: 其人少欲意者變為男子形。
analyzed: 其人少欲意者變為男子形。
translated: those with few desires transformed into male forms.
Those with many desires transformed into women.

original: 身變化男女之後便生染愛。
analyzed: 身變化男女之後便生染愛。
translated: After the transformation of the bodies into male and female, they gave rise to lustful love.
Together, they engaged in sexual activities in private places.

original: 第十五天上人福命盡者。
analyzed: 第十五天上人福命盡者。
translated: The fifteenth heaven, when the blessings and lifespans of the people were exhausted,
they descended and were born in a woman's womb as a fetus.
After 300 days, they became human.
From then on, they gave birth to boys and girls.
They married each other.
The six relatives became close.
When they ate nonglutinous rice,
people's lifespans were millions of years.
All had contentious and competitive thoughts.
Although they ate naturally, they stole from each other.
They beat each other.
The polished rice was exhausted.
It naturally grew back.
They divided the fields and set boundaries.
They each guarded their own.

original: 由有愚人私相篡盜不可禁制。
analyzed: 由有愚人私相篡盜不可禁制。
translated: Because there were foolish people who privately usurped and stole, it was impossible to prohibit and control.
They established the king's law.
The ministers and officials checked and supervised each other.
They rewarded the good and punished the evil.
They governed the country with the law and did not oppress the people.

original: 人各各求輸衣食以供王。
analyzed: 人各各求輸衣食以供王。
translated: Each person sought to pay taxes in clothing and food to supply the king.
At that time, people lived for five hundred years.
From then on, they competed with each other.

original: 負債不還者即變畜生身。
analyzed: 負債不還者即變畜生身。
translated: Those who owed debts and did not repay them transformed into animals.
They drank water and ate grass.
When born, they carried heavy loads.
When dead, their skin was flayed.

original: 象馬牛羊驢騾駱駝猪狗鷄鵜鵝鴨熊羆虎豹犲狼麋麈麞鹿雉兔。
analyzed: 象馬牛羊驢騾駱駝猪狗鷄鵜鵝鴨熊羆虎豹犲狼麋麈麞鹿雉兔。
translated: Elephants, horses, cows, sheep, donkeys, mules, camels, pigs, dogs, chickens, cranes, geese, ducks, bears, tigers, leopards, wolves, deer, musk deer, roe deer, pheasants, rabbits, and so on.
They were all created by humans.
Such transformations were innumerable.

original: 當爾時人慳貪者即變化餓鬼。
analyzed: 當爾時人慳貪者即變化餓鬼。
translated: At that time, those who were stingy and greedy became hungry ghosts.
Their bodies were forty li tall.
When they walked, the joints and head rubbed against each other,
making a sound like five hundred carriages.
Their bellies were large, and their throats were like needles.
If they saw food and drink, it transformed into fire and charcoal.
If they saw the Ganges River, it transformed into pus and blood.
They went east and west in search of food, drinking molten copper.
The food entered their stomachs through their throats.
The hundred joints all burned with fire.
Such suffering and pain were indescribable.
At that time, people committed the ten evil deeds.

original: 殺生偷盜邪婬妄言兩舌惡口謗語貪欲瞋恚愚癡者。
analyzed: 殺生偷盜邪婬妄言兩舌惡口謗語貪欲瞋恚愚癡者。
translated: Killing, stealing, sexual misconduct, false speech, divisive speech, harsh speech, frivolous speech, covetousness, ill-will, and ignorance.
They were brought between the two Iron Encircling Mountains.

original: 於十八地獄中而考治之。
analyzed: 於十八地獄中而考治之。
translated: They were examined and punished in the eighteen hells.

original: 第一鑵湯地獄　第二鑪炭地獄第三刀山地獄　第四劍樹地獄第五黑闇地獄　第六寒氷地獄第七火車地獄　第八刀兵地獄第九火輪地獄　第十鐵鐖地獄第十一銅柱地獄　第十二沸屎地獄第十三拔舌地獄　第十四釘身地獄第十五吐火地獄　第十六飲銅地獄第十七愚癡地獄　第十八火城地獄行十惡者。
analyzed: 第一鑵湯地獄　第二鑪炭地獄第三刀山地獄　第四劍樹地獄第五黑闇地獄　第六寒氷地獄第七火車地獄　第八刀兵地獄第九火輪地獄　第十鐵鐖地獄第十一銅柱地獄　第十二沸屎地獄第十三拔舌地獄　第十四釘身地獄第十五吐火地獄　第十六飲銅地獄第十七愚癡地獄　第十八火城地獄行十惡者。
translated: First, the boiling water hell; second, the burning charcoal hell; third, the knife mountain hell; fourth, the sword tree hell; fifth, the dark hell; sixth, the cold ice hell; seventh, the fire cart hell; eighth, the knife and weapon hell; ninth, the fire wheel hell; tenth, the iron saw hell; eleventh, the copper pillar hell; twelfth, the boiling excrement hell; thirteenth, the tongue-pulling hell; fourteenth, the nailed body hell; fifteenth, the fire-vomiting hell; sixteenth, the copper-drinking hell; seventeenth, the foolish hell; eighteenth, the fire city hell. Those who commit the ten evil deeds

original: 皆悉遍此十八地獄中受罪。
analyzed: 皆悉遍此十八地獄中受罪。
translated: will all suffer the consequences in these eighteen hells.

original: 一一地獄中經億千萬歲。
analyzed: 一一地獄中經億千萬歲。
translated: In each hell, they will spend billions and millions of years.

original: 彼地獄中一日一夜當人間十二萬歲。
analyzed: 彼地獄中一日一夜當人間十二萬歲。
translated: One day and night in that hell is equivalent to 120,000 years in the human realm.
In this way, it is a very long time.
Only then will they be released.
They will then enter the realm of animals.

original: 五千萬歲受鳥狩形。🔽畜生罪畢復入餓鬼中五百萬歲。
analyzed: 五千萬歲受鳥狩形。 畜生罪畢復入餓鬼中五百萬歲。
translated: For five million years, he will take on the form of a bird or beast.🔽After the sins of the animal realm are exhausted, he will again enter the realm of hungry ghosts for five hundred thousand years.

original: 餓鬼罪畢復生邊地夷狄之中。
analyzed: 餓鬼罪畢復生邊地夷狄之中。
translated: After the sins of the hungry ghost realm are exhausted, he will be reborn in the borderlands among barbarians.
He will be captured by the king and become a slave.
For another five hundred lifetimes,
only then will his sins be exhausted.
Those who observe the five precepts will again obtain a human body.
Those who practice the ten wholesome deeds will be reborn in the heavens.
Those who practice the Way will attain the Way.
The Buddha said:

original: 須彌山北陸地名欝單越。
analyzed: 須彌山北陸地名欝單越。
translated: To the north of Mount Sumeru, the land is called Uttarakuru.
The area is four hundred thousand miles.
The lifespan of the people is one thousand years.
The height of the people is four feet.
The human face resembles the shape of the land, being square.

original: 樹上生衣服及七寶瓔珞。
analyzed: 樹上生衣服及七寶瓔珞。
translated: Clothes and seven precious jeweled necklaces grow on the trees.
The land naturally produces nonglutinous rice.
Its taste is like nectar.
Eating it, one is free from illness.
There is no high or low status.
The people of that land always have fixed occupations.
There are also none who die prematurely.

original: 彼土人民無有乳養之者。
analyzed: 彼土人民無有乳養之者。
translated: The people in that land have no one to raise them.
When a child is born, they place it on the side of the road.

original: 令行人舒指內口中唼之。
analyzed: 令行人舒指內口中唼之。
translated: They make passersby put their fingers in the child's mouth to suck on them.
After seven days of sucking on the fingers, the child becomes an adult.
They go to the foot of a tree.
They look up at the tree.
Seven-jeweled necklaces and robes appear on their bodies.
There is no suffering of dyeing or polishing them.
There is also no labor of cutting, sewing, or mending.
The people in that country are uniquely handsome.

original: 於三天下最為第一。🔽逢女為婦。
analyzed: 於三天下最為第一。 逢女為婦。
translated: They are the most beautiful in the three worlds.🔽If they encounter a woman, they become her husband.
If they encounter a man, they become his wife.
Those people have a compassionate mind and do not kill living beings.
When the dragon king brings rain, it rains wonderful flowers.
The people in that land take them to adorn themselves.
They do not raise each other when born.
They are not buried when they die.
Large birds carry the corpses to uninhabited lands.
Their spirits ascend to heaven and do not pass through evil realms.

original: 上持五戒得生其國　須彌山北日出時。
analyzed: 上持五戒得生其國　須彌山北日出時。
translated: By observing the five precepts, one can be reborn in that country. When the sun rises in the north of Mount Sumeru,

analyzed: 山西日中。 山南日沒。
translated: At noon in the west of the mountain,🔽at sunset in the south of the mountain,
at midnight in the east of the mountain.

original: 須彌山高三百三十六萬里。
analyzed: 須彌山高三百三十六萬里。
translated: Mount Sumeru is 3,360,000 li high.
Its shape is like a slender waist drum.
The lower root enters the water.

original: 亦三百三十六萬里至金剛際。
analyzed: 亦三百三十六萬里至金剛際。
translated: It is also 3,360,000 li to the adamantine base.

original: 從頂至下根凡高六百七十二萬里。
analyzed: 從頂至下根凡高六百七十二萬里。
translated: From the peak to the lower root, it is 6,720,000 li high in total.

original: 小鐵圍小海水際已上高六百七十二萬里。
analyzed: 小鐵圍小海水際已上高六百七十二萬里。
translated: Above the small iron enclosure and the small sea, it is 6,720,000 li high.

original: 入海水深六百七十二萬里。
analyzed: 入海水深六百七十二萬里。
translated: The small sea enters the water and is 6,720,000 li deep.

original: 從頂至下根凡高一千三百四十四萬里。
analyzed: 從頂至下根凡高一千三百四十四萬里。
translated: From the peak to the lower root, it is 1,344,000,000 li high in total.
The small iron enclosure has a small circumference.
This four-continent world has Mount Sumeru.
In the Qin language, it is called Mount Kunlun.

analyzed: 四寶合成。 東面黃金。
translated: It is composed of four treasures.🔽The east side is golden.

analyzed: 西面白銀。 南面琉璃。
translated: The west side is white silver.🔽The south side is lapis lazuli.
The north side is crystal.
The east side is golden.

original: 黃金光明照東方虛空界悉作黃金色。
analyzed: 黃金光明照東方虛空界悉作黃金色。
translated: The golden light illuminates the eastern direction, and the entire space becomes the color of gold.
The beings in that direction think it is a yellow sky.
In the west, it is white silver.

original: 白銀光明照西方虛空界悉作白銀色。
analyzed: 白銀光明照西方虛空界悉作白銀色。
translated: The white silver light illuminates the western direction, and the entire space becomes the color of white silver.
The beings in that direction think it is a white sky.
In the south, it is lapis lazuli.

original: 琉璃光明照南方虛空界悉作琉璃色。
analyzed: 琉璃光明照南方虛空界悉作琉璃色。
translated: The lapis lazuli light illuminates the southern direction, and the entire space becomes the color of lapis lazuli.
The beings in this direction think it is a blue sky.
In the north, it is crystal.
The crystal light illuminates the blue sky.
The light of the four treasures illuminates all directions.
It all becomes the same color, without any boundary.

original: 一切眾生空明濁翳為色所障。
analyzed: 一切眾生空明濁翳為色所障。
translated: All beings are obscured by the turbidity of empty light, which is obstructed by form.
Therefore, it is called Mount Sumeru.

original: 得天眼者爾乃得見　佛言。
analyzed: 得天眼者爾乃得見　佛言。
translated: Only those who attain the heavenly eye can see it. The Buddha said:

original: 須彌山東陸地名弗波提。
analyzed: 須彌山東陸地名弗波提。
translated: To the east of Mount Sumeru, the land is called Jambudvīpa.
It is 3.2 million li wide and long.
Its land is perfectly round.
The human faces resemble the landforms.
The body is one zhang tall.
They live for 650 years.
These people have a compassionate mind and do not kill living beings.
The sky rains various treasures, and clothing and food appear naturally.
Those who uphold the five precepts will be reborn in that country.

original: 須彌山東日出時。🔽山北日中。
analyzed: 須彌山東日出時。 山北日中。
translated: When the sun rises over Mount Sumeru in the east,🔽it is noon on the north side of the mountain.
When the sun sets on the west side of the mountain,
it is midnight on the south side of the mountain. The Buddha said:

original: 須彌山西陸地名拘耶尼。
analyzed: 須彌山西陸地名拘耶尼。
translated: To the west of Mount Sumeru, the land is called Kuru.
It is 360,000 li wide and long.
The land is shaped like a half-moon.
The human faces resemble the shape of the land.
The body is two zhang tall.
The lifespan is 250 years.
These people have a compassionate mind and do not kill living beings.
The sky rains flowers, beards, clothing, and food appears naturally.
Those who uphold the five precepts with an intermediate level of sincerity will be reborn in that country.

original: 須彌山西日出時。🔽山南日中。
analyzed: 須彌山西日出時。 山南日中。
translated: When the sun rises over the west side of Mount Sumeru,🔽it is noon on the south side of the mountain.
When the sun sets on the east side of the mountain,
it is midnight on the north side of the mountain. The Buddha said:

original: 須彌山南陸地名閻浮提。
analyzed: 須彌山南陸地名閻浮提。
translated: To the south of Mount Sumeru, the land is called Jambudvīpa.
280,000 li wide and long.
The ground is wide at the top and narrow at the bottom.
The human faces resemble the shape of the land.
The people of that land have no fixed occupation.

original: 受報不渟。🔽上壽百二十歲。
analyzed: 受報不渟。 上壽百二十歲。
translated: Their rewards and punishments are not constant.🔽The upper limit of their lifespan is 120 years.
The middle limit is 100 years.

original: 下壽八十歲。🔽上身長丈二。
analyzed: 下壽八十歲。 上身長丈二。
translated: The lower limit is 80 years.🔽The upper limit for human height is 12 feet.
The middle limit is 10 feet.
The lower limit is 8 feet.
They have little flattery and deceit.

original: 於慈心唯仰食力無有自然。
analyzed: 於慈心唯仰食力無有自然。
translated: They only rely on the power of food for compassion, and nothing is spontaneous.
When it rains from the heavens, the rain is clear and cold water.
It moistens the five grains, millet, fruits, and trees.
The dragon kings' rain is no different.
Even when the eon is about to end,
people are extremely evil.
They grasp grass to form swords and knives.
They then kill each other.
At that time, the lifespan is five years.
All five grains are completely destroyed.
The reduction in the karmic actions of sentient beings is not the same.
Those who uphold the five precepts at the lower level are reborn in this land.

original: 須彌山南日出時。🔽山東日中。
analyzed: 須彌山南日出時。 山東日中。
translated: When the sun rises south of Mount Sumeru,🔽it is noon on the east side of the mountain,
and sunset on the north side.
At midnight on the west side, the Buddha said:

original: 日去地八十四萬里。🔽黃金作裏城。
analyzed: 日去地八十四萬里。 黃金作裏城。
translated: The sun is 840,000 li away from the ground.🔽It is made of gold inside the city,
and crystal outside the city.

original: 是以故天下常明日行有三道。
analyzed: 是以故天下常明日行有三道。
translated: Therefore, there are always three paths for the sun to travel in the world.
In winter, it travels the southern path,
above the ice mountains.
Therefore, it is very cold in the world.
In spring and autumn, it travels the middle path,
so it is neither cold nor hot.
In summer, it travels the northern path,
above the people.

original: 又人北有三百三十六萬里。
analyzed: 又人北有三百三十六萬里。
translated: Moreover, there are 3,360,000 li north of the people.
The sun's essence is a golden lotus flower.
Therefore, it is very hot in the world.
The sun's city is square,
2,400 li long and wide.
It is made of gold and crystal.
People live for 250 years,
and their bodies are 10 li long.
Their food and clothing are natural.

original: 日天子者放千光明普照百千國。
analyzed: 日天子者放千光明普照百千國。
translated: The sun god emits a thousand rays of light, illuminating hundreds of thousands of countries.
There are also men and women there.
Practicing the five precepts and ten wholesome deeds, lighting lamps to illuminate the Buddha,

original: 修此功德得生日中　佛言。
analyzed: 修此功德得生日中　佛言。
translated: cultivating these merits, they attain rebirth in the sun. The Buddha said:

original: 月去地八十四萬里。🔽白銀作裏城。
analyzed: 月去地八十四萬里。 白銀作裏城。
translated: The moon is 840,000 li away from the ground.🔽The inner city is made of white silver.
The outer city is made of lapis lazuli.

original: 月從始生一日銀面轉向人。
analyzed: 月從始生一日銀面轉向人。
translated: The moon begins to grow from the first day, turning its silver side towards people.
On the fifteenth day, it faces people directly.
Therefore, the moon is full and illuminates the world.

original: 從六日以去瑠璃面轉向人。
analyzed: 從六日以去瑠璃面轉向人。
translated: From the sixth day onward, the lapis lazuli side turns towards people.
On the thirtieth day, it faces people directly.
This is when the world is in great darkness.

original: 月城縱廣高下千九百六十里。
analyzed: 月城縱廣高下千九百六十里。
translated: The moon city is 1,960 li long and wide.
It is made of white silver and lapis lazuli.
People live for 250 years.
Their bodies are 10 li tall.
Their clothing and food are natural.
There are also men and women there.
Practicing the five precepts and ten wholesome deeds, lighting lamps to illuminate the Buddha,

original: 修此功德得生月中　佛言。
analyzed: 修此功德得生月中　佛言。
translated: Cultivating these merits, one is born in the moon. The Buddha said:
The five stars are:
In the east, the star of age;

original: 南方熒惑星西方太白星。
analyzed: 南方熒惑星西方太白星。
translated: In the south, the planet Mars; in the west, the star of Tai Bai;
In the north, the star of Chen;
In the center, the star of Zhen.
These are called the five stars.
There are three grades: large, medium, and small.
The large star is 120 li long and wide;
The medium star is 80 li;
The small star is 40 li.
They are all made of water-refined stone to form city walls.
They are 840,000 li above the ground.

original: 隨藍風而轉之故不落也　佛言。
analyzed: 隨藍風而轉之故不落也　佛言。
translated: They revolve due to the blue wind, so they do not fall. The Buddha said:
The heavens have twenty-eight lunar mansions.
They are divided into four directions.
They correspond to the four seasons without losing their regular patterns.
In the east, there are seven lunar mansions:
Jiao, Kang, Di, Fang, Xin, Wei, and Ji.
In the south, there are seven lunar mansions:
Jing, Gui, Liu, Xing, Zhang, Yi, and Zhen.

original: 西方七宿。🔽升手女虛危室辟。
analyzed: 西方七宿。 升手女虛危室辟。
translated: In the west, there are seven lunar mansions:🔽Sheng, Shou, Nü, Xu, Wei, Shi, and Pi.
In the north, there are seven lunar mansions:

original: 奎樓胃昴畢觜參　如今日月星宿悉是諸天宮殿七寶莊嚴。
analyzed: 奎樓胃昴畢觜參　如今日月星宿悉是諸天宮殿七寶莊嚴。
translated: Kui, Lou, Wei, Mao, Pi, Zi, and Shen - like the sun, moon, and stars, they are all the palaces of the heavens, adorned with the seven treasures.

original: 玄處虛空四時轉運不失節度者。
analyzed: 玄處虛空四時轉運不失節度者。
translated: They dwell in the void, revolving through the four seasons without missing the proper time.
They are also held by the five winds.
The first is the holding wind.
The second is the waiting wind.
The third is the assisting wind.
The fourth is the turning wind.
The fifth is the moving wind.

original: 以制仰之不墜落也。🔽星宿中人身。
analyzed: 以制仰之不墜落也。 星宿中人身。
translated: They are held up and do not fall.
The people among the stars are ten zhang tall.
Their lifespan is two hundred and fifty years.

original: 當今人間四百五十萬歲。
analyzed: 當今人間四百五十萬歲。
translated: This is equivalent to four million five hundred thousand years in the human world.

original: 人間二十五歲於星宿天中一日一夜。
analyzed: 人間二十五歲於星宿天中一日一夜。
translated: Twenty-five years in the human world is one day and night in the heavens of the stars.
Their food and clothing are natural.
The light of the sun shines on their necks and backs.
They can fly freely.
There are also men and women among them.

original: 斯由人間受持五戒十善得生其中。
analyzed: 斯由人間受持五戒十善得生其中。
translated: This is because those in the human world who uphold the five precepts and ten wholesome deeds are reborn there.

original: 東方天王宮舍治須彌山半腰黃金聳上。
analyzed: 東方天王宮舍治須彌山半腰黃金聳上。
translated: The palace of the Eastern Heavenly King is located halfway up Mount Sumeru, towering with golden splendor.
It is 1,680,000 li away from the ground.

original: 須彌山東天王名提頭賴吒。
analyzed: 須彌山東天王名提頭賴吒。
translated: On the east of Mount Sumeru, there is the Heavenly King named Dhṛtarāṣṭra.
In Chinese, it means governing the country.

original: 主一切乾闥婆毘舍闍鬼。
analyzed: 主一切乾闥婆毘舍闍鬼。
translated: He is the lord of all gandharvas and piśācī demons.
The lifespan of the Heavenly King Dhṛtarāṣṭra is 500 years.
It is equivalent to 9 million years in the human world.

original: 人間五十歲為四天王宮一日一夜。
analyzed: 人間五十歲為四天王宮一日一夜。
translated: Fifty years in the human world is one day and night in the palace of the Four Heavenly Kings.
Thirty days make a month.
Twelve months make a year.
Clothes and food are naturally provided.
There are also men and women there.
Their bodies are 20 li tall.
By practicing the five precepts and ten wholesome deeds, one can be reborn there.

original: 南方天王宮舍治須彌山半腰瑠璃聳上。
analyzed: 南方天王宮舍治須彌山半腰瑠璃聳上。
translated: The palace of the Heavenly King in the south is located halfway up Mount Sumeru, towering with lapis lazuli.
It is 600,000 li away from the ground.

original: 須彌山南方天王名毘樓博叉。
analyzed: 須彌山南方天王名毘樓博叉。
translated: The Heavenly King in the south of Mount Sumeru is named Virūḍhaka.
In Chinese, it means increasing.

original: 主一切毒龍及富單那鬼。
analyzed: 主一切毒龍及富單那鬼。
translated: He is the lord of all poisonous dragons and pūtanā demons.
The lifespan of the Heavenly King Virūḍhaka is 500 years.
It is nine million years in the human realm.

original: 人間五十歲為四天王宮一日一夜。
analyzed: 人間五十歲為四天王宮一日一夜。
translated: Fifty years in the human realm is one day and night in the palace of the Four Heavenly Kings.
Thirty days is one month.
Twelve months is one year.
Clothing and food are natural.
There are also men and women there.
The body is twenty li tall.
By practicing the five precepts and ten wholesome deeds, one can be reborn there.

original: 西方天王宮舍治須彌半腰白銀聳上。
analyzed: 西方天王宮舍治須彌半腰白銀聳上。
translated: The palace of the Heavenly King of the West is located halfway up Mount Sumeru, towering with white silver.
It is 1,680,000 li above the ground.

original: 須彌山西天王名毘樓勒奇。
analyzed: 須彌山西天王名毘樓勒奇。
translated: The Heavenly King of the West on Mount Sumeru is named Virūḍhaka.
In Chinese, it means difficult to surpass.

original: 主一切鳩槃荼薜荔多鬼。
analyzed: 主一切鳩槃荼薜荔多鬼。
translated: He is the lord of all kumbhāṇḍa and pretas.
The Heavenly King's lifespan is five hundred years.
It is nine million years in the human realm.

original: 人間五十歲為四天王宮一日一夜。
analyzed: 人間五十歲為四天王宮一日一夜。
translated: Fifty years in the human realm is one day and night in the palace of the Four Heavenly Kings.
Thirty days is one month.
Twelve months is one year.
Clothing and food are natural.
There are also men and women there.
The body is twenty li long.
By practicing the five precepts and ten wholesome deeds, one can be reborn there.

original: 北方天王宮舍治須彌山半腰水精聳上。
analyzed: 北方天王宮舍治須彌山半腰水精聳上。
translated: The palace of the Northern Heavenly King is located halfway up Mount Sumeru, towering above the water crystal.
It is 1,680,000 li above the ground.
The Northern Heavenly King of Mount Sumeru is named Virūḍhaka.
In Chinese, it means much hearing.
He is in charge of all yakṣas and rākṣasa demons.
The lifespan of the Heavenly King Virūḍhaka is 500 years.
It is equivalent to 9 million years in the human realm.

original: 人間五十歲為四天王宮一日一夜。
analyzed: 人間五十歲為四天王宮一日一夜。
translated: Fifty years in the human realm is one day and night in the palace of the Four Heavenly Kings.
Thirty days make one month.
Twelve months make one year.
Clothing and food are naturally provided.
There are also men and women there.
The body is twenty li long.
By practicing the five precepts and ten wholesome deeds, one can be reborn there.

original: 四天王宮中雖有日月歲數之名無有日月之形。
analyzed: 四天王宮中雖有日月歲數之名無有日月之形。
translated: Although the palaces of the Four Heavenly Kings have the names of the sun, moon, and years, they do not have the forms of the sun and moon.
The reason for this is as follows.
The heavenly beings in the palaces of the Four Heavenly Kings,
The light from the back of the neck illuminates each other.
There is no day or night.
It is always bright and never dark.
If you want to know the appearance of no day or night,

original: 但看蓮華開合即便知也。🔽蓮華敷時即名為晝。
analyzed: 但看蓮華開合即便知也。 蓮華敷時即名為晝。
translated: just look at the opening and closing of the lotus flowers, and you will know.🔽When the lotus flowers bloom, it is called daytime.
When the flowers close, it is called nighttime.
The four qi are harmonious and pleasant.
Not cold, not hot.

original: 乃至三十三天重重皆爾。
analyzed: 乃至三十三天重重皆爾。
translated: Up to the thirty-three heavens, all are like this.

original: 但彼日月年歲轉長倍不相類也。
analyzed: 但彼日月年歲轉長倍不相類也。
translated: But their years and seasons are longer and do not correspond to each other.
The Four Heavenly Kings each lead one side of the world.
On the eighth day of every month, they send messengers
to inspect the world.

original: 伺察帝王臣民天龍鬼神蜎蜚蚑行蠕動之類。
analyzed: 伺察帝王臣民天龍鬼神蜎蜚蚑行蠕動之類。
translated: They observe the emperors, ministers, people, heavenly dragons, spirits, flying insects, crawling creatures, and wriggling creatures.
Thoughts in the mind, words spoken,
and actions of the body, good or bad.
Record good deeds and bad deeds.
Not missing a single hair.
Those who do good enter the heavenly registers.
Those who do evil enter the human four dark chambers.
On the fourteenth day, the prince descends.
On the fifteenth day, the Four Heavenly Kings themselves descend.
On the twenty-third day, they again send messengers down.
On the twenty-ninth day, they again send the prince.
On the thirtieth day, the Four Heavenly Kings themselves descend again.
The sun, moon, five planets, and twenty-eight lunar mansions.
All the heavenly beings in between descend together.

original: 微伺世間帝王臣民諸龍鬼神含血之類。
analyzed: 微伺世間帝王臣民諸龍鬼神含血之類。
translated: They secretly observe the world, emperors, ministers, people, dragons, ghosts, and blood-sucking creatures.
Who has filial piety and support for their parents?
Respecting the Three Jewels?

original: 受持三歸五戒十善八齋。
analyzed: 受持三歸五戒十善八齋。
translated: Upholding the Three Refuges, Five Precepts, Ten Wholesome Deeds, and Eight Precepts?
Building stupas, creating images, and cultivating various merits?
Practicing the six pāramitās, kindness, and four equalities?
Generosity, morality, patience, and diligence?

original: 一心智慧慈悲喜捨養育眾生者。🔽即條藏不上奏天帝釋。
analyzed: 一心智慧慈悲喜捨養育眾生者。 即條藏不上奏天帝釋。
translated: With one-pointed wisdom, compassion, joy, and equanimity, nurturing sentient beings?🔽They immediately report it to the Heaven of the Thirty-three.
Śakra receives the report and passes it down to the celestial offices.
Life is extended and the lifespan is fulfilled for a hundred years.
At the time of death,
Heavenly musicians lead and follow the jeweled carriage.

original: 五百天女散華燒香而來迎之上生天上天王之宮。
analyzed: 五百天女散華燒香而來迎之上生天上天王之宮。
translated: Five hundred heavenly maidens scatter flowers and burn incense to welcome him to the palace of the heavenly king in the Heaven of Rebirth.
His clothes are mysterious and wonderful.
His food is delicacies.
He moves through the air.
He dwells in a flower palace.
His eyes see wondrous forms.
His ears hear wondrous music.
His mouth savors a hundred flavors.
His nose smells wondrous fragrances.
His body wears brocade.
His mind roams in the pure lands.
These merits and virtues take the ten wholesome deeds as provisions.
As for those who do evil,

original: 帝釋承書關下地獄閻羅大王。
analyzed: 帝釋承書關下地獄閻羅大王。
translated: Indra receives the report and sends it down to the hells and the palace of King Yama.
He immediately dispatches the five officials of the hells,
reduces their lifespan, and seizes their allotted life span.
This is called shooting death.

original: 地獄長士兵人持鐵索圍之。
analyzed: 地獄長士兵人持鐵索圍之。
translated: The soldiers of the hells hold iron ropes to surround them.
What they see is different.
They cannot speak with their mouths.
Each one receives their retribution of blessings and misfortunes according to their past habits.
One cannot seek to be released by offering wealth or begging for mercy.
The heavens do not take the wrong.
They are impartial and without two sides.
Committing crimes leads to receiving punishment.
Cultivating blessings leads to practicing the Way.
One creates and receives oneself.
It is not bestowed by others.
At that time, the World-Honored One spoke a verse, saying:

original: 十善得生天　　五戒服人身　　十惡墮地獄🔽低突墮畜生　　忍辱得端政　　瞋恚得醜陋
analyzed: 十善得生天　　五戒服人身　　十惡墮地獄 低突墮畜生　　忍辱得端政　　瞋恚得醜陋
translated: By practicing the ten wholesome deeds, one is reborn in the heavens; by observing the five precepts, one obtains a human body; by committing the ten evil deeds, one falls into hell.🔽By being humble and yielding, one attains a handsome appearance; by being angry, one becomes ugly.

original: 布施得大富　　慳貪墮貧窮
analyzed: 布施得大富　　慳貪墮貧窮
translated: By being generous, one becomes greatly wealthy; by being stingy and greedy, one falls into poverty.
The second heaven is called the Heaven of the Thirty-three.
It is called the Heaven of Śakra Devānām-Indra.
As for the four great ministers,
they are the Four Heavenly Kings.
As for the Thirty-three Heavens,
Śakra has thirty-two ministers.

original: 通釋之身故有三十三天。
analyzed: 通釋之身故有三十三天。
translated: Because of Śakra's body, there are thirty-three heavens.

original: 釋提桓因在摩尼寶殿上坐時。🔽前面有八臣。
analyzed: 釋提桓因在摩尼寶殿上坐時。 前面有八臣。
translated: When Śakra Devānām-Indra sits in the Mani Jewel Palace,🔽in front of him there are eight ministers,

original: 後面有八臣。🔽左面有八臣。
analyzed: 後面有八臣。 左面有八臣。
translated: in back there are eight ministers,🔽on the left there are eight ministers,
and on the right there are eight ministers.

original: 四八三十二故有三十二輔臣。
analyzed: 四八三十二故有三十二輔臣。
translated: There are thirty-two ministers,
The three dukes are:
The Duke of Situ, the Duke of Shao-gong, and the Duke of Ma-gong.
The nine ministers are:
The eight great ministers,
The eight messengers of the king,
The Lord of She on the left and the Lord of Ji on the right,
The Lord of Wind, the Lord of Rain, the Lord of Thunder, and the Lord of Lightning,
The general on the left, the general on the right,
The general in front, and the general in the rear,
The four guardians of the martial guards and the four garrisoned heavenly kings,
The five great kings, the prince, and the messengers,
The sun, moon, five stars, and twenty-eight lunar mansions,

original: 鬼神將軍悉帝釋之官僚也。
analyzed: 鬼神將軍悉帝釋之官僚也。
translated: The generals of the ghosts and spirits are all officials of the Emperor of Heaven.
The Emperor of Heaven has a queen,
Named Yueyi.

original: 其身左右各有八萬四千資媚。
analyzed: 其身左右各有八萬四千資媚。
translated: On her left and right, there are 84,000 attendants,

original: 於其面上復有八萬四千資容。
analyzed: 於其面上復有八萬四千資容。
translated: And on her face, there are 84,000 attendants.

original: 此后資容於帝釋三十二那由他婇女最為第一。
analyzed: 此后資容於帝釋三十二那由他婇女最為第一。
translated: This queen's attendants are the foremost among the 32 nayutas of court ladies of the Emperor of Heaven.

original: 須彌山頂去地高三百三十六萬里。
analyzed: 須彌山頂去地高三百三十六萬里。
translated: The peak of Mount Sumeru is 3,360,000 li above the ground.

original: 山頂縱廣三百三十六萬里。
analyzed: 山頂縱廣三百三十六萬里。
translated: The summit is 3,360,000 li long and wide.
The city is called Joyful to Behold.

original: 離四天王宮百六十八萬里。
analyzed: 離四天王宮百六十八萬里。
translated: It is 1,680,000 li away from the palace of the Four Heavenly Kings.

original: 入海水復深三百三十六萬里。
analyzed: 入海水復深三百三十六萬里。
